input_args.instruction: 'Context: Disease dermatomyositis associates Gene HLA-DPA1. Disease childhood type dermatomyositis associates Gene LY86. \n\nQuestion: Out of the given list, which Gene is associated with dermatomyositis and childhood type dermatomyositis. Given list is: GSDMB,  HLA-DQA1,  ADH1B,  POU5F1B, HLA-B'
